title: SS Girls - Bruno Mattei 1977.DVDrip.XviD
description:
There is a growing concern about high-ranking traitors in the Third Reich. But how to expose them? Recruit a bunch of whores to bang the truth out of them, that&#039;s how. Madame Eva (Macha Magall, "SS Hell Camp"), Frau Inge (Marina Daunia) and some loyal Nazis round up local girls for prostitute boot camp. Here, they learn ballet, fencing, toga weightlifting, and the seduction of freaks and German Shepherds. By the time their training is complete, they&#039;ll be able to squeeze confessions from the kinkiest of traitors.

Directed by Bruno Mattei ("Violence In A Women&#039;s Prison", "SS Extermination Camp"), "SS Girls" is stacked to the ceiling with flesh, decadence and pure insanity.
